actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to donate to the Devils Lake Sioux Tribe, Fort Totten Reservation, some submarginal lands of the United States, and to make such lands part of the reservation involved.

summary.text: Donates to the Devils Lake Sioux Tribe, Fort Totten Reservation, North Dakota, specified lands of the United States. States that such lands shall be part of the reservation heretofore established for the tribe.

titles.title: A bill to donate to the Devils Lake Sioux Tribe, Fort Totten Reservation, some submarginal lands of the United States, and to make such lands part of the reservation involved.
